title: Entered unreachable code in rustc_resolve::::Resolver::resolve_rustdoc_path

labels.name: T-rustdoc
labels.description: Relevant to the rustdoc team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: A-intra-doc-links
labels.description: Area: Intra-doc links, the ability to link to items in docs by name

labels.name: E-needs-mcve
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs a Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example

body:
Maybe related: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/96012 ### Code ``` git clone https://github.com/DelSkayn/rquickjs.git cd rquickjs git submodule update --init --recursive ``` Remove this line: ```diff diff --git a/sys/build.rs b/sys/build.rs index 4c1ca1c..e27fe20 100644 --- a/sys/build.rs +++ b/sys/build.rs @@ -116,7 +116,7 @@ fn main() { builder.file(out_dir.join(src)); } - builder.compile("libquickjs.a"); + // builder.compile("libquickjs.a"); } fn feature_to_cargo(name: impl AsRef) -> String { ``` ``` cargo build --features="macro" ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.69.0-nightly (44cfafe2f 2023-03-03) binary: rustc commit-hash: 44cfafe2fafe816395d3acc434663a45d5178c41 commit-date: 2023-03-03 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-musl release: 1.69.0-nightly LLVM version: 15.0.7 ``` ### Error output ``` error: Error relocating /var/tmp/rust/debug/deps/librquickjs_macro-efe9159a12e70037.so: JS_Eval: symbol not found --> src/lib.rs:96:9 | 96 | pub use rquickjs_macro::{bind, embed, FromJs, HasRefs, IntoJs, IntoJsByRef}; | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ thread 'rustc' panicked at 'internal error: entered unreachable code', compiler/rustc_resolve/src/lib.rs:1883:67 ```
Backtrace

``` stack backtrace: 0: rust_begin_unwind at /rustc/44cfafe2fafe816395d3acc434663a45d5178c41/library/std/src/panicking.rs:579:5 1: core::panicking::panic_fmt at /rustc/44cfafe2fafe816395d3acc434663a45d5178c41/library/core/src/panicking.rs:64:14 2: core::panicking::panic at /rustc/44cfafe2fafe816395d3acc434663a45d5178c41/library/core/src/panicking.rs:114:5 3: ::resolve_rustdoc_path 4: ::resolve_and_cache_rustdoc_path 5: ::resolve_doc_links 6: ::late_resolve_crate 7: ::time::<(), ::resolve_crate::{closure#0}> 8: ::resolve_crate 9: rustc_interface::passes::resolver_for_lowering 10: ::with_deps::<>::with_task_impl)>>::{closure#0}, &rustc_data_structures::steal::Steal<(rustc_middle::ty::ResolverAstLowering, alloc::rc::Rc)>> 11: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query:: 12: ::resolver_for_lowering 13: ::enter::)>> 14: rustc_span::with_source_map::, rustc_interface::interface::run_compiler, rustc_driver_impl::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}::{closure#0}> note: Some details are omitted, run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full` for a verbose backtrace. error: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.69.0-nightly (44cfafe2f 2023-03-03) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-musl note: compiler flags: --crate-type lib -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental=[REDACTED] -C target-cpu=skylake -C linker=clang -C link-arg=-fuse-ld=lld -C target-feature=-crt-static note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden query stack during panic: #0 [resolver_for_lowering] getting the resolver for lowering end of query stack error: could not compile `rquickjs` due to previous error ```
